website_summaries.verdict: This large yet lightweight bag offers a number of features and enhanced security designed to make extended vacations a breeze.
pros: Large central compartment, with a full U-shaped opening to give you access to all your stuff
Handle locks in three positions, and offers an ergonomic grip
Available in Anthracite or Dark Teal
Wet/dry pocket is handy for storing dirty clothes or shoes
Includes a Travel Sentry Approved combination lock
cons: On the expensive and large side
Not all pockets can be securely locked

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but don't trust the rubber hook holes on the sides
customer_reviews.text: The bag worked great for our trip, but the side straps buckle through a rubber/plastic holes. One of them was torn through in transit & now I have nowhere to attach the strap. Bad design - should have been of sturdier material.
customer_reviews.author: Patty L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag for my cruise
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bag. It was perfect for my cruise. Just right for 4-5 day trip. It is very light weight but I felt that I had to be careful when packing it full. Sturdy but would give only four stars. I will be able to access its durability with future trips. This bag is definitely distinguishable from all others and that is what I wanted, in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Skeete

customer_reviews.title: Quality built large light weight bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. From a great manufacturer. Love Swiss gear products. Great size light weight well built travel bag for world traveler. This replaced my Ogio bag. Which I loved. But was very heavy when empty. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  A. Holtel

customer_reviews.title: Tough Traveller
customer_reviews.text: Distinct from other bags on the baggage reclaim carousel. Has withstood 1.5 years of hard travelling and heavy loads very, very well. Still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: NRN

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: Its a good piece of luggage but too tall, may not meet the requirements on some airlines. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicFood

customer_reviews.title: Well made and pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this piece of luggage. Fits quite a bit more than I had anticipated. Well made and pretty to look at! Lightweight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Mio

customer_reviews.title: Love how lightweight yet sturdy this piece of luggage is
customer_reviews.text: Love how lightweight yet sturdy this piece of luggage is. Have not traveled with it yet, but it’s definiteiy more spacious than it appears at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap breaks
customer_reviews.text: One of the tightening straps broke during our first use and there is no way to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Feavel

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely difficult to move around - front bottom handle kept scraping on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag and the dark teal color makes the bag easy to identify coming off the baggage carousel. Please watch my video showing the zippers, interior and exterior of the bag. One noticeable feature is how light this bag is!! For a bag this size to also be durable it is light. This is going to be a great bag for packing our ski gear this winter. I also own the Burton Bag and you can't go wrong with either bag...top quality and real travel work horses! For comparison:
customer_reviews.author: BeachBrights

product_meta.title: Victorinox Unisex VX Touring Wheeled Duffel Extra-Large
product_meta.description: You have an adventurous spirit, but you also enjoy the finer things in life. The VX Touring Wheeled Duffel Extra-Large from Victorinox® fits all of your needs perfectly in one smart package. Made of polyester fabrics with water resistant coated polyurethane. The lightest of the Victorinox wheeled carry on collection! U-Shaped zipper closure with expansion capabilities. Adjustable side compression straps with durable Hypalon attachments cinch to stabilize heavy loads. Ergonomic comfort grip handles with a one-touch, monopole handle system with ergonomic comfort grip locks into three different positions at 37", 39" and 41". Interior zippered mesh storage pocket, Y-shaped webbing compression straps, a large zippered mesh lid pocket and a zippered mesh side pocket containing a key fob and slip pockets. Exterior features includes a padded front laptop pocket can accommodate up to a 15.6 inch laptop, a zippered quick access side pocket and two rear, wet pockets ideal for shoes, swim suits, or dirty clothes. Rear skid plate provides protection to areas most prone to damage. Hypalon zipper pulls are lockable. Removable add-a-bag strap secures a second bag to the front of the duffel and holds up to 30 lbs. Inline wheels for the smoothest glide. Products covered by the Global 10-Year Limited Warranty are guaranteed to be free from manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for 10 years from the date of original purchase. Travel Sentry® Approved combination lock. Imported. WARNING California's Proposition 65 Measurements: Bottom Width: 15 in Middle Width: 17 1⁄2 in Top Width: 15 in Depth: 12 1⁄2 in Extended Depth: 13 in Height: 34 1⁄2 in Handle Length: 8 in Handle Drop: 1 1⁄2 in Weight: 8 lbs 2.4 oz
feature_bullets: Designed for adventure, this spacious wheeled duffel is lightweight and full of function
Spacious main compartment with large U-shaped opening expands 3 cm (1.1") for additional capacity
Interior organization includes Y-shaped webbing compression straps, a large zippered mesh lid pocket and a zippered mesh side pocket containing a key fob and storage slots
Exterior organization includes a padded front compartment, a zippered quick-access side pocket and two rear, easy-to-clean, wet/dry pockets ideal for storing running shoes or dirty clothes
